document_data.name: Narthel Harlhaun
document_data.familyrefs: {{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|44}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 36: The Satraps of Delzimmer, Part 1}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Narthel Harlhaun''' was a member of the [[Harlhaun]] merchant family in [[Delzimmer]] ''circa'' the [[1373 DR|Year of Rogue Dragons, 1373 DR]].
document_data.Description: The Harlhauns tended to be tall and thin, with high cheekbones and large, dark eyes, and Narthel fit the mold fairly well.
document_data.Relationships: Narthel was the youngest scion of the Harlhaun family and was in quiet competition with his older brother [[Lariond Harlhaun|Lariond]] for prominence in the family, hoping to become the next leader of the clan. Both brothers chauvinistically wrote off their older sister [[Arleithe Harlhaun|Arleithe]] as a contender, which she found insulting. Observing the finer points of etiquette hid their true feelings from everyone, but Narthel attempted to subvert Lariond's ambitions and Lariond returned in kind.
